name: Beatlocked
description:
Overview

Escape the gang while hopping to the beat in this challenging puzzle rhythm game!

You play as Molly, a daredevil bunnygirl trying to escape Deton City. She pissed off a high-ranking gang member, and now they are out to get her. It's your task to help her get out of the city safely to hide and get some backup.

Controls

Arrows/WASD/ZQSD to move

Mechanics

Molly is able to move for three beats of every bar. On the fourth beat enemies move. You will lose if an enemy jumps to her tile. Get to the exit without being caught!

Known Issues

-Game unclear - all you have to do is move to the beat and get to the exit (a hole).
-Music is off-sync - sometimes music becomes out of sync with the game. Easiest solution is restarting the game.
-Getting killed at the exit - a bug allows enemies to attack you if it's their turn and you're at the exit.
-The areas in menu don't have images.
